Name: Halite NaCl
Type: Mineral
Class: Halides
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 45-125um
Sample No.: H-3A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Michigan, Wayne County, Detroit
Collected by Ward's
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: h03aa.txt
